name: Mahjong - Season ( Spring Summer Autumn Winter )
name_original: Mahjong - Season ( Spring Summer Autumn Winter )
description:
The new and free matching game available on the store.

[GOAL]
Remove all tiles out of the board by pairs

[FEATURES]
-Hint, shuffle, sunshine make all tiles available pairs
-Over 100 levels
-4 scenes
-Leaderboard
